edu.cmu.pslc.logging.distiller

Class GeometryDistiller

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cmu.pslc.logging.distiller.GeometryDistiller

  • public class GeometryDistiller
extends java.lang.Object
    A distiller for what we generally refer to as "Hao's Data". This is Area Unit of the Geometry curriculum from around 1996 or 1997. This program is expecting a tab delimited file with a strict format.
    Version:
    $Revision: 10730 $
    Last modified by: $Author: alida $
    Last modified on: $Date: 2014-03-05 16:33:25 -0500 (Wed, 05 Mar 2014) $
    Author:
    Alida Skogsholm
